thread.title: Save £5 on all books at WHSmith
thread.title_full: Save £5 on all books at WHSmith - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save £5 on all books at WHSmith
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with WHSmith to offer readers £5 off when you spend £15 on all books at WHSmith High Street stores. Treat yourself or your loved ones to a new title from the fantastic range WHSmith has to offer. There are books to suit all ages and tastes, from the latest bestselling novels, to biographies from your favourite celebrities and must-have young adult titles. Plus - find stories from all your child’s favourite authors. How to Claim See the newspaper on Saturday, September 26, 2015 telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
